title: Error: Could not decrypt bytes
body: ### Description Installed latest nightly http://artifacts.status.im:8081/artifactory/nightlies-local/im.status.ethereum-b40b04-n-fl.apk and see white blank screen on app start Tried to clear data/cache, uninstall/reinstall the app, reboot the phone. ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: http://artifacts.status.im:8081/artifactory/nightlies-local/im.status.ethereum-b40b04-n-fl.apk * Operating System: Android 8.1 * Device: OnePlus 5 * App permissions: Location, Photo, Storage #### Logs
